message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bit closer to my desired price. How about we meet at $125?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think we can do better than $125. How about $115?
I understand you're trying to get closer to my desired price, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not quite ready to give up on my initial target just yet. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $130. How about we meet at $120?
I understand you're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $127.50?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $127.50. How about we meet at $125?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more small concession. How about we meet at $126?
I'm really close, but I think I can do better. How about we meet at $123?
